00029 namespace votca { namespace kmc {
00030 
00031 //defines hgversion
00032 #include "hgversion.h"
00033 static const std::string version_str = std::string(VERSION) + " " + hgversion + " (compiled " __DATE__ ", " __TIME__ ")";
00034 
00035 const std::string &KmcVersionStr()
00036 {
00037     return version_str;
00038 }
00039 
00040 void HelpTextHeader(const std::string &tool_name)
00041 {
00042     std::cout
00043          << "==================================================\n"
00044          << "========   VOTCA (http://www.votca.org)   ========\n"
00045          << "==================================================\n\n"
00046          << "please submit bugs to " PACKAGE_BUGREPORT "\n\n" 
00047          << tool_name << ", version " << votca::kmc::KmcVersionStr() 
00048          << "\nvotca_tools, version " << votca::tools::ToolsVersionStr()
00049          << "\n\n";
00050 }
